channel.title: Infosec on Owlglass
channel.description: Recent content in Infosec on Owlglass

item.title: Recon - Port Scanning and Nmap
item.description: Nmap scanning SYN (stealth) scan TCP handshake not completed (ACK not sent) 1 nmap -sS <ip> Because the three-way handshake is never completed, the information is not passed to the application layer and as a result, will not appear in any application logs. A SYN scan is also faster and more efficient because fewer packets are sent and received. TCP Connect Scan 1 nmap -sT <ip> TCP SYN Scan and UDP Scan 1 nmap -sU -sS 192.

item.title: Web Pentest - Wordpress
item.description: Wordpress WPScan Enumerate vulnerable plugins, users, db exports: wpscan --url <url> -e dbe,u,vp
